MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA16 postcode area of Lochwinnoch. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00pm to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network on Calderpark Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.56pm on the 27th January 2021.
